strapiPost.title: Home Sweet Home Music Festival Welcomes Local And National Artists Into The Living Room
strapiPost.content:
The 4th annual Home Sweet Home Music Festival by City Sessions is fast approaching, bringing music and hospitality together in Downtown Bentonville on April 28-29.

  • Welcome home: This music-filled weekend will consist of 50 shows featuring 23 local artists and ten national artists hosted across 14 homes and venues in Downtown Bentonville. Some exciting headliners include David Ramirez, Joshua James, National Park Radio, and Ira Wolf.
  • Weekending: Day Passes include three shows plus the headliner and refreshments for $60, or pick up a Weekend Pass, a $120 value, for just $100 when you use the discount code HSH23. Or go all out with the $250 Wheelhouse VIP pass, including a private show with Ira Wolf and Will Gunselman catered by Conifer at the Howard.

Reserve your tickets HERE. We're giving away a pair of Day Passes to the first four people to email us back!
